DataElement.preferredName: Geriatrics Informant Questionnaire on Cognitive Decline in the Elderly Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The branch of medical science that deals with diseases and problems specific to elderly people._A questionnaire designed to assess whether an individual had a decline in cognitive functioning. This questionnaire is answered by a friend or family member of the individual and each situation is rated by the informant for the amount of change over the previous 10 years._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
